title: The Best Video Game Movies of All Time
description:
We go through an Esquire Top 16 video game movies and see if it's a good or bad list! 
From this episode of Gamescast: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TxJ_Sd264Uo&t=13s  

Go to http://KindaFunny.com/MonsterHunterNow to play right now!
This episode is sponsored by BetterHelp — go to http://betterhelp.com/kindafunny to get 10% off your first month.

FOLLOW US ON EVERYWHERE!
